excerpt.vi: Looking for the best lash salon in HCMC? Discover the top 10 most reputable addresses for eyelash extensions. Leading the list is Nanky Beauty in District 2 (Thao Dien), known for international master techniques.
excerpt.en: Looking for the best lash salon in HCMC? Discover the top 10 most reputable addresses for eyelash extensions. Leading the list is Nanky Beauty in District 2 (Thao Dien), known for international master techniques.

content.vi:
Are you looking for a reputable and high-quality lash salon in HCMC? With the explosion of the beauty industry, finding a reliable "lash salon near me" among hundreds of choices is not easy. In this article, we will help you discover the best lash salons where beauty and safety are always top priorities. Let's explore now!

1. Nanky Beauty – International Class Lash Artistry in District 2 (Thao Dien)

Address: 71 Vanh Dai Tay, An Khanh Ward, District 2, HCMC (Thao Dien Area)

Hotline: 0852.759.678

Opening Hours: 08:00 – 21:00 (Monday - Sunday)

Rating: 5.0 ⭐ - The #1 choice for eyelash extensions in Thao Dien.

When mentioning the most premium and reputable lash address in HCMC, Nanky Beauty cannot be ignored. Located in the heart of Thao Dien, District 2, Nanky Beauty is not just a lash salon, but a place where top-notch art and technique converge. This is the ideal destination for Expats and locals seeking perfection, absolute safety, and a luxurious beauty experience.

Nanky Beauty's difference comes from 3 core factors: International Master Technique, Exclusive Imported Materials, and Medical-Grade Sterile Process. Our technicians are not just skilled; they are artists with 7-10 years of experience, trained in Korea and the US. We ensure each lash set is custom-designed to perfectly fit your eye shape.

We commit to using only the highest quality products: Korean glue for 3x durability, and exclusive ultra-light lash lines like Feather Lashes and Mink Lashes. If you are searching for the best lash extensions in District 2, Nanky Beauty is the perfect answer.

2. Tien Casa – 3D Lash & Curl

Address: 297/1 Huynh Van Banh, Ward 11, Phu Nhuan, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0936 159 834

Tien Casa is a reputable address in Phu Nhuan district, specializing in professional lash extension and curling services. The Korean-style lash extension here suits many people, bringing beautiful, natural, and attractive lashes.

3. Huyen Noi Mi

Address: 188/16b, Vo Van Tan, Ward 5, District 3, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0932 072 796

Huyen Noi Mi is an address trusted by many women with high-quality lash services. The shop offers a variety of lash techniques suitable for each eye shape, committed to bringing harmony and naturalness to the eyes.

4. Wings Lashes

Address: 159A De Tham, Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 1, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 1800 8154

Wings Lashes is a leading address in the field of eyelash extensions in HCMC. With gentle, non-sticky techniques and applying advanced methods, Wings Lashes can effectively fix sparse and falling lashes.

5. Nzim Beauty Room

Address: 46 Nguyen Thong, Ward 9, District 3, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0936 968 611

Nzim Beauty Room prides itself on being one of the top places specializing in beautiful lashes. With modern technology and high-quality lash materials, Nzim is committed to giving you naturally curled eyes without complicated makeup.

6. Darley Beauté

Address: 120/4 Tran Huy Lieu, Ward 15, Phu Nhuan, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0909 988 679

Darley Beauté is a famous lash salon with luxurious space and modern equipment. With over 3 years of experience, Darley Beauté is proud to bring customers the highest quality lash experiences.

7. Mishang Noi Mi

Address: 104 Cong Quynh, Pham Ngu Lao Ward, District 1

Hotline: 0927 922 688

Mishang Noi Mi has quickly created a luxurious and modern space. Mishang specializes in advanced lash techniques such as natural silk lashes, cluster lashes, and volume lashes.

8. SuMi Eyelash Beauty

Address: 29D Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ward 4, Phu Nhuan, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0969 005 563

SuMi Eyelash Beauty is a famous lash salon trusted by many women. The shop stands out with professional lash services, painless, non-sticky, and non-irritating to the eyes.

9. MEILASH – Japanese Lash Extension

Address: 8 Street No. 2, Do Thanh Condo, Ward 4 District 3

Hotline: 0375 561 564

Meilash is proud to own a modern space and full equipment. Meilash stands out with Japanese lash extension techniques and uses high-quality products.

10. Lashes By Nana

Address: 32 Street No. 1, An Lac, Binh Tan, Ho Chi Minh

Hotline: 0932 132 351

Lashes By Nana stands out with meticulous and precise lash techniques, using high-quality products. Lashes By Nana offers diverse lash services such as natural silk lashes, cluster lashes, and volume lashes.

Above is the list of the most reputable and high-quality lash extension salons in HCMC. Each salon offers unique services, but for the best experience in District 2 and Thao Dien, Nanky Beauty remains the top recommendation.
